name: 賴建宏
objective:
本課程主要在研討程式語言的編譯技術。課程所所涵蓋的內容主要圍繞：

- 直譯器和編譯器原理
- 編譯器製作
- LLVM 架構
- CLang
- 自訂自己程式語言的方法

程式規畫、實作，在這課程中比重相當大
schedule:
This course mainly discusses the compilation technology of programming language. The content covered in the course mainly revolves around:

- Principles of interpreter and compiler
- Compiler production
- LLVM architecture
- CLang
- How to customize your own programming language

Program planning and implementation are very important in this course
materials: Will have basic lectures in PDF files, and some examples
